title: Gulf War Journal
description: Scott Neithammer comes out of retirement to cover the first Persian Gulf War. He finds himself also caught up in the war between th Pentagon and the press! Fed up with press restrictions, he heads off into the desert on his own -- and gets an unwelcome firsthand taste of athe full fury of modern American firepower. Contains all new-new story about teh Second Persian Gulf War and the tragic cost Operation Iraqi Freedom has for Neithammer.
author: Don Lomax
